properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa prema raajukapari nannentho preminchunu ee raaju vaada nainacho naa ketti lemi ledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Poshinchi naadu naatmaku jeevampu neeti nitchun poshinchu daani nityamun jeevaahaarambu thonu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ne thappu throvanundagaa rakshimpa vedake nannu modambutho kanugonen nan mandalona jerchen{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paatalam yokka cheekati nan bheeti parcha bodu naa daapu nunda kristesu naa mundu nilchun silva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa drustilo nahaaramu siddambu Jethu veevu nee shuddha premaanandamul paaren rakshimpa nannu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
